alfredsnippet.snippet:
"The author predicts that the unity and consistency of nature eventually will prevail in the minds of man with the recognition that there are no mysterious energies or forces, only electromagnetic fields with self-gravitation. The mysterious nature of the 'strong forces' will go the way of the epicycles of Ptolemy and the phlogiston of the late 18th century."

- Winston Bostick, Toward Understanding The Nature of Fusion Energy, Fusion, May 1978
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Strong Forces as Epicycles or Phlogiston
